headline: Charles River Joins EASYGEN Consortium, Supports Development of Bedside CAR-T Manufacturing
summary: WILMINGTON, Mass., August 26, 2025--Charles River joins EASYGEN to provide 3D screening expertise, supporting the development of a bedside CAR-T manufacturing platform .

content.title: Charles River Joins EASYGEN Consortium, Supports Development of Bedside CAR-T Manufacturing
content.summary: WILMINGTON, Mass., August 26, 2025--Charles River joins EASYGEN to provide 3D screening expertise, supporting the development of a bedside CAR-T manufacturing platform .

thumbnail.caption: In the front row, from left to right: Dr. Sonja Steppan (EASYGEN Principal Investigator, Fresenius SE), Prof. Dr. Michael Hudecek (Fraunhofer IZI), Theresa Kagerbauer (TQ Therapeutics), Dr. Agnes Vosen (HZDR), Christopher Wegener (Kabi), Vaclovas Radvilas (EBMT), Dr. Julia Schüler (Charles River), Dr. Julia Busch-Casler (HZDR), Nicole Spanier-Baro (Fraunhofer IESE), Vivienne Williams (Cellix Limited), Prof. Dr. Bertram Glaß (Helios), Prof. Dr. Ulrike Köhl (Fraunhofer IZI), Rebecca Scheiwe (Fresenius SE). In the back row, from left to right: Prof. Dr. Ralf Kuhlen (Fresenius SE), Prof. Dr. Jens O. Brunner (DTU), Dominik Narres (Fresenius SE), Thomas Brzoska (Pro-Liance Global Solutions), Dr. David Krones (Fraunhofer IZI), Dr. Sabine Bertsch (Pro-Liance Global Solutions), Dr. Ralf Hoffmann (Philips), Christin Zündorf (TQ Therapeutics), Dr. Anna Dünkel (Fraunhofer IZI). © Johannes Krzeslack

headline: Liposome Development and Manufacturing Services Market Industry Report 2025-2035, with Profiles of Baxter BioPharma, Charles River Laboratories, Evonik, Fresenius Kabi, GEA, Intertek, and Fujifilm
summary: Opportunities in the liposome development and manufacturing market arise from the increasing need for bioavailability solutions, with growing interest in therapeutic and nutraceutical applications. North America leads the market, but Latin America shows high growth potential. Clinical scale services and partnerships with service providers are key.
